prompts: Create a bird-like Pokemon that thrives in urban environments with a unique scavenging ability.
I want a dark-type Pokemon resembling a vulture with a strong presence in mountainous areas.
Generate a flying Pokemon with a mix of brown and black feathers, known for its intimidating glare.
Make a Pokemon that has a distinct skeletal appearance and can easily adapt to various habitats.
Imagine a creature that thrives around corpses, with a personality that reflects cunning and intelligence.
Design a Pokemon with sharp claws and a fierce demeanor, often found in desert biomes.
Give me a Pokemon that exhibits a protective nature toward its friends and allies.
